div.a: What The Pentagon Told Hollywood About The Bin Laden Raid

div.div: Because of the extreme dearth of official documents released, this interview between Kathryn Bigelow and the DOD is the most illuminating official U.S. government account of Operation Neptune Spear available.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XHD9XA&via=Digg&text=What The Pentagon Told Hollywood About The Bin Laden Raid

div.a: The Treatments Doctors Never Want For Themselves

div.div: We trust doctors to save our lives. But when it comes to the critical question of what to do when death is at hand, there seems to be a gap between what we want doctors to do for us, and what doctors want done for themselves.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W4WfWp&via=Digg&text=The Treatments Doctors Never Want For Themselves

div.a: The Tiny Transforming Apartment That Packs Eight Rooms Into 420 Square Feet

div.div: When you walk in, you encounter what is, at first glance, a small studio apartment. Within that cube are actually 8 functional spaces.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/YbvC7o&via=Digg&text=The Tiny Transforming Apartment That Packs Eight Rooms Into 420 Square Feet

div.a: Inside The Overstimulated, Underregulated Caffeine Industry

div.div: Caffeine has gone crazy. It now comes in so many forms that it’s hard to keep up: soft drinks, obviously, but also energy drinks, energy shots, chewing gum, sports gels, and nasal sprays. In all of them, the marquee ingredient is a white powder, delivered to our bloodstreams by a sophisticated global supply chain that few of us know anything about.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Up44Vy&via=Digg&text=Inside The Overstimulated, Underregulated Caffeine Industry

div.a: Your Genetic Secrets Can Now Be Hacked, Stolen, And Used For Target Marketing

div.div: Imagine receiving an email that says "you have very desirable traits, would you like to be a sperm donor?" or "You are a rare blood type, please consider donating blood." Do we want to restrict that kind of communication with people?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/Yc0c0I&via=Digg&text=Your Genetic Secrets Can Now Be Hacked, Stolen, And Used For Target Marketing

div.a: Photos: The Chinese Factory Workers Who Make Our Toys

div.div: Approximately 75% of the world's toys are "Made in China" so it's no wonder that there are so many factory workers assembling, stuffing, and painting a myriad of toys. But one isn't fully aware of this concept until it is seen

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/VMKt5Q&via=Digg&text=Photos: The Chinese Factory Workers Who Make Our Toys

div.a: After Years Of Silence, The Plague Can Rise Again

div.div: Microbiologists now have evidence that strains of the plague may be able to reactivate themselves and trigger new outbreaks — even after lying dormant for decades.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WiRNmP&via=Digg&text=After Years Of Silence, The Plague Can Rise Again

div.a: 11 Bizarre Ways They Treated The Flu In The Olden Days

div.div: A guide to treating and preventing the flu circa a long time ago.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SIskqk&via=Digg&text=11 Bizarre Ways They Treated The Flu In The Olden Days

div.div: OPENS WINE BOTTLES AND ALL YOUR FILES

div.a: Why Red October Malware Is The Swiss Army Knife Of Espionage

div.div: The Red October malware that infected hundreds of computer networks in diplomatic, governmental, and scientific research organizations around the world was one of the most advanced espionage platforms ever discovered.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/11Cuzya&via=Digg&text=Why Red October Malware Is The Swiss Army Knife Of Espionage

div.div: BEFORE THEY WERE PLUMBERS, THEY MADE PIZZA

div.a: The Inspirations Behind The Names Of Famous Video Game Characters

div.div: Did you know that Princess Zelda was named after Zelda Fitzgerald, or that Luigi’s name was inspired by pizza?

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10hMgm5&via=Digg&text=The Inspirations Behind The Names Of Famous Video Game Characters

div.div: Instagram reported a few usage stats today, marking the first time it has talked about numbers on its own site since the kerfuffle raised over its terms of service change following the Facebook buy-out.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XHkew2&via=Digg&text=Instagram Is Not Losing Users

div.div: BLAME FORKS IF YOU HAD BRACES

div.a: How Forks Gave Us Overbites And Pots Saved The Toothless

div.div: A new book looks at how historical changes in the ways we cook and eat have dramatically altered public health.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13HhGCq&via=Digg&text=How Forks Gave Us Overbites And Pots Saved The Toothless

div.a: Porn Star James Deen On His 'Canyons' Experience With Lindsay Lohan

div.div: Following a scandalous exposé of Lohan’s outrageous behavior during the making of Paul Schrader’s film The Canyons, her co-star, porn legend James Deen, tells Marlow Stern what it’s really like working with LiLo—four-way sex scenes and all.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/URTCGk&via=Digg&text=Porn Star James Deen On His 'Canyons' Experience With Lindsay Lohan

div.a: How Obama Has Aged In Four Years

div.div: Time roughs up presidents. Photos of Barack Obama on Election Night 2008 look like they were taken much longer ago. Now his face has deeper creases and crow’s feet, while his hair has turned white.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/W0ZVYY&via=Digg&text=How Obama Has Aged In Four Years

div.div: HE WAS ON MORE THAN JUST HIS BIKE
It has taken a long time for him to come clean.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/SQALzU&via=Digg&text=Lance Armstrong: Evolution Of Lies

div.a: Passwords With Proper Grammar Are More Hackable

div.div: By now, everyone knows the basic rules to creating a strong password. All those rules might be for naught, however, if your password has any sort of grammatical structure.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/XHdcre&via=Digg&text=Passwords With Proper Grammar Are More Hackable

div.div: A REASON TO READ ABOUT PUPPIES

div.a: Why Wolves Are Forever Wild, But Dogs Can Be Tamed

div.div: Dogs and wolves are genetically so similar, it's been difficult for biologists to understand why wolves remain fiercely wild, while dogs can gladly become "man's best friend."

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/13J6MLv&via=Digg&text=Why Wolves Are Forever Wild, But Dogs Can Be Tamed

div.div: American Airlines just completely redesigned their logo and livery for the first time in over 40 years.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/WKK93f&via=Digg&text=Giving American Airlines A Makeover

div.a: How Alan Turing Helped Break The Unbreakable Nazi Code

div.div: The very thing that made the Enigma Machine nearly impossible to break, its ability to encode messages without ever repeating a letter, also made the code decipherable. But first, Alan Turing had to step in.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/USLzcq&via=Digg&text=How Alan Turing Helped Break The Unbreakable Nazi Code

div.a: How To Make Your Own Girl Scout Cookies

div.div: The Girl Scouts are notorious for not offering their cookies online, and after a six-to-eight-week period, they're gone until next year. And if you don't know a Girl Scout or live near an area of the U.S. that sells cookies, you're just plain out of luck.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/10ghuKl&via=Digg&text=How To Make Your Own Girl Scout Cookies

div.a: Mathematical Breakthrough Sets Out Rules For More Effective Teleportation

div.div: For the last ten years, theoretical physicists have shown that the intense connections generated between particles as established in the quantum law of ‘entanglement’ may hold the key to eventual teleportation of quantum information.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/S3D5lq&via=Digg&text=Mathematical Breakthrough Sets Out Rules For More Effective Teleportation

div.a: The Dakar Rally Is The Toughest Motorsport On Earth

div.div: The Dakar Rally travels more than 5,280 miles over 14 stages in some of the most unforgiving territory on Earth. Here are some of the best images of this year's race.

a.href: https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?url=http://on.digg.com/U4baBT&via=Digg&text=The Dakar Rally Is The Toughest Motorsport On Earth

div.a: HBO's 'Silicon Valley' Sounds Way Better Than Bravo's 'Silicon Valley'

div.div: The pilot script to HBO's upcoming comedy "Silicon Valley" has leaked and it's way better than last year's tragic Bravo reality show of the same name.
